data.name: ClientSideJs
DuplicatedPKCERequiredParamError
data.value: You must indicate either the SECRET when using Authorization Code or the CODE_VERIFIER when using Authorization Code with PKCE, you're providing both.

data.name: InvalidHashMissingAccessTokenError
data.value: invalid_hash: response_type contains `token`, but the parsed hash does not contain an `access_token` property

data.name: InvalidHashMissingIdTokenError
data.value: invalid_hash: response_type contains `id_token`, but the parsed hash does not contain an `id_token` property

data.name: MissingPKCERequiredParamError
data.value: You must indicate either the SECRET when using Authorization Code or the CODE_VERIFIER when using Authorization Code with PKCE, both values are missing.

data.name: NotAltChashWarning
data.value: WARNING: No at_hash claim was present in the id_token.
